subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New Files Uploaded to file section
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
This is great! I think it shows that it's the raw audio that matters. To me 
there seems to be many that think my boxes are like somekind of oracle or 
something, and they miss the fact that it's only supplying the raw audio for 
spirits to form their voices with. I don't want to cheapen the experience, 
but I want to show that it is more of a science now, it's repeatable, and 
other systems can be made that do the same thing. This FM scan method has 
the advantage of fewer parts, smaller boards, and seemingly easier to use. I 
think this system would be marketable.

Thanks Steve for posting your voices!

Frank
